name: Combat Couch Racing
description:
A prototype local coop racing game with combat mechanics made in the Godot engine.

Controls

Keyboard:

Move -> WASD and Arrow Keys

Boost -> Shift and Control

Attack -> F and Numpad 0

Self destruct -> E and Numpad 5

Controller

Accelerate -> A/X Button (XBox/PS)

Brake -> X/Square Button (XBox/PS)

Steer -> Left Stick

Boost -> R2/RT

Attack -> R1/RB

Self destruct -> D-Pad Down

Github to source code
